website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight option, designed for all seasons. Whether you live in a warm locale or simply sleep hot all year long, this set will help you stay comfortable throughout the night.
pros: Earns praise for its soft, inviting texture
Reversible design can be flipped from pattern to solid
Light, fluffy, and breathable enough for all seasons
Available in several print variations and color options
cons: With only a comforter and 2 pillowcases, it certainly isn't the most comprehensive set

customer_reviews.title: Great for hot weather!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really pretty, very lightweight comforter — perfect for summer or a hot climate! I’m someone who can’t sleep without a blanket but the combination of these 90+ degree summer days and having my bedroom at the top of the house means tossing and turning and waking up sweaty. This is very lightweight — heavier than a sheet but not heavy enough to add too much warmth. Perfect. The color is as vivid and pretty as it appears in the picture and matches my turquoise sheets perfectly. I love that it’s reversible when I want to change up the look without too much effort.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui L

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I was wondered this would be too thin for my liking, or that it would be rough and scratchy. We've had a horrible winter so far, so it's been a little colder than I'm used to and this comforter is perfect! I love that it's reversible, also. I haven't washed it yet, so I can't speak on whether it holds up after a wash, so I will come back and add to this review on that front. Pretty sure it'll be a lot softer once washed, too, not that it's not soft now.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good summer comforter, weird material though
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I knocked off a star is because the material feels like the shell of a sleeping bag. Good quality stitching and the pattern is cute. Little wrinkly but overall I like it. I ordered a king for my queen bed and I like that it hangs over the side
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Super soft!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have ordered. I loved the first one so I ordered another one for our guest room. The first one did shrink slightly when I washed it but not much. It is buttery soft and just warm enough for all seasons. I’m sure I would love the second one too but I ordered solid gray/ charcoal for a bedroom with lime green curtains and when I received it, it was a teal print. I have guests on their way for the holidays and the new bedspread is the wrong color 😕
customer_reviews.author: Debbie S

customer_reviews.title: Thin, but warm
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned at first because this comforter looks a lot thinner than in the photos. It's actually very warm though. My husband gets too hot with a thick blanket, so we have a thin, king size blanket (link omitted because Amazon doesn't want you to have that info, apparently) over the whole bed and I layered this blanket on top of that on my side only. With both blankets I'm very cozy and my husband stays nice and cool on his side of the bed.
customer_reviews.author: S. Leather

customer_reviews.title: WE GOT BED BUGS FROM THIS!
customer_reviews.text: So I loved this blanket the first week we had it, and then after that we found bed bugs crawling it. So now we have two mattresses with bed bugs and have to spend hundreds of dollars to get rid of them. We have NEVER had this issue before. BE CAREFUL ORDERING THIS PRODUCT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: c. armentrout

customer_reviews.title: Sleep in luxurious comfort
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening the package, I downright fell in love with this comforter. From its luxurious feel, to its vibrant color and breathable construction, I'm hands-down impressed. There are NO chemical smell compared to other sheets I bought and it's also lightweight. This is totally an ideal choice for year-round comfort and warmth.
customer_reviews.author: Jan C.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible  Lots of fluff dust.
customer_reviews.text: After 2 months this is disgusting a lot of fluff from inside stuffing. He has a sick nose and throat, You're allergic to fuzzy you never buy this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy Larger
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this bedspread is "just okay." I'm not upset, but I'm not impressed. Another reviewer said that the Queen doesn't fit. I agree. I took the reviewer's advice and bout a king for my queen bed. That was the proper size.
customer_reviews.author: JEFF F. HAINES

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE!!!! I received my item and it seems ok. I am giving 1 star because when you receive the item, there is a card that tells you to register your item to activate a warranty. So, you go online, you’re forced to create an account so they now have your info to sell or spam you with. I sent them an email because they have no phone number. They DO NOT respond. So I you want email spam, no customer service, and an account you don’t need, buy away. Otherwise, AVOID!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dave K

customer_reviews.title: Ideal comforter for warm sleepers who like cool rooms
customer_reviews.text: I am a warm sleeper, my body turns into an easy bake oven and I will sweat like crazy with the wrong blanket. This comforter is soft and keeps me cool, but not too thin that I’m freezing at night. For perspective I live in Texas and keep my room 65-70 when I sleep. I’ve had it get as warm as 75-80 and was still cool under this blanket. For the price I highly recommend for anyone who needs to be cool to sleep but struggles with either freezing or sweating.
customer_reviews.author: BetaJim

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: My wife was so happy when we received this for our guest room. After one wash we noticed it had a rip. Don’t know how why that would have happened. Poor quality. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Del Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, Comfy, Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I like to "change up" the look of the bedroom frequently so I enjoy buying comforters that are reasonably priced so I can change them out when I want to without feeling like I'm wasting money! I've enjoyed this comforter for 6 weeks now and it's holding up really very well - and I was unsure that it would. It is lightweight, large enough for my boyfriend and I to comfortably share and durable enough for the dog to lie on when he sneaks on to the bed. I need to wash it soon so I'll be sure to update my review on how it withstands the washing!
customer_reviews.author: JKThomas87

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy! Read review.
customer_reviews.text: Opened it up for the first time, bought this a few months ago. I finially got to buy the new bed frame i was aiming for. Looks like this blanket has been stepped on or dragged through something, looks used. I'm throwing it away cause it has a weird in a nice way to put it... Ass smell. Needless to say I'm pissed and I wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ShutterPanda

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, soft and simple
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we were looking for to put in my teen son's room. He doesn't like fancy, and prefers softer textures. I was skeptical when it came in such a small box, but it fluffed up nicely-- but is still light weight. It fit nicely on his queen size bed, and covered sides well. He has a bed frame so no skirt is needed. We may add a light blanket under it in winter, but for this price point, it was a quick easy refresh for his room without breaking the bank. Recommend if you want a simple, clean product that feels nice to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Y

customer_reviews.title: Too thin and cheap feeling..
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed at how thin this comforter was. Not what I expected from the description online..I returned it and found a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Markley

customer_reviews.title: I love this comforter!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this comforter! I purchased the King Tan/Brown color way and it just looks fantastic. It doesn’t look cheap like a motel comforter, and it’s not stiff like one either. I was afraid trying to find a comforter over the internet would end in me needing to buy several in order to find “the one”, but I was very pleasantly surprised when I came across this. It looks great, it’s lightweight (if you are looking for something heavy, this isn’t the one for you) and it’s nicely priced as well. Now, if I could get my cats to stay off it, it would be purrfect! They seem to really love it as well!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and warm comforter set
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is light weight and it keeps me warm in this cold weather of chicago. I love the fact that it is reversible and the pillow cases has chain feature. Will be buying different color as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah T

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and perfect !
customer_reviews.text: This was a bit brighter than I thought it would be but its just fine. My only complaint is the picture Amazon shows for this comforter, shows it coming to the floor as if it was a bedspread. I wanted to it to come to the floor . I ordered a Queen and it fits like a Queen should but I returned the Queen and ordered the King so it would covet up the box spring without the need for a skirt . 1st pic is the Queen size , 2nd pic is the King size as a comparison .
customer_reviews.author: Professional Groomer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS COMFORTER.
customer_reviews.text: It turned out that this comforter was just what I was looking for. I have always bought country quilts and decided they were just too heavy for me these days. I wanted something a little fluffier and light weight though I believe this will still work in the winter. Took me a long time to make a decision and I am not disappointed at all. Take note that the description say "lightweight" "Down alternative" not heavy or is it down fill or anything like that.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C.

customer_reviews.title: Love this blanket
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is stylish and lightweight. Not to thin not to thick it’s perfect. I got just the perfect match to go with my room decor. At the price for the comforter and two pillow shams this is a great deal. Only dissapointment I have is although it says the color is teal it’s more like a mint green as you can see from the photo. Teal is more the color of my throw pillow the strip that’s on the one side. So the picture they show on their description for the teal comforter is pretty off of the actual color
customer_reviews.author: DriftWood

customer_reviews.title: Thin and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: These feel so thin like they will tear quickly. Not happy but not going through the hassle of returning.
customer_reviews.author: Jess:)

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this comforter!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our new bed and we love it. I can’t reccomend this comforter enough! It’s extremely comfortable and I love the design... and the price is perfect! We have had no issues at all. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: soft and comfy
customer_reviews.text: My last comforter that I bought at Macy's during their "sale" was quickly falling apart after 3 months of use and wash so I decided to look elsewhere and give Amazon a try due to their wonderful return policies. This comforter is very soft and comfy. The size (queen) fits my bed perfectly. I especially like that it's reversible so I can put the darker side on top for winter and lighter side on top during summer. I have washed this comforter three times already and don't see any dramatic damages, unlike the one that I bought earlier at Macy's. It's working out well so far and I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: idlezork

customer_reviews.title: Comfortably warm
customer_reviews.text: I've slept in this now 4 nights now and it's lightweight, and perfectly warm. Not waking up drenched in sweat or looking to steal my fiance's blankets. Great color and pattern. I'm knocking it to 2 stars overall because the double stitch seam going up the middle either pulled out or wasn't sewn in at all so now we find ourselves with string being wrapped 8n our legs/feet. It's basically a single stitch in the center not a double like the rest of the bed. Not sure how it will hold up over time through being washed and dried. I have photos to upload when I have a minute.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas D.

customer_reviews.title: Best comforter I've ever owned....Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The price is good and the quality of the comforter is also very good. It is not heavy like some other comforter's I've had and yet it keeps you warm during the night. Thank you for making such a nice comforter at a decent price that actually fits a king size bed and drapes down nicely on both sides of the bed. I no longer have to tug the comforter to get it back from my husband. Bonus!
customer_reviews.author: snorkie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I thought the comforter was a nice touch to complete my daughter's bedroom, but we notice it had a RIP in it. We just got it in the mail today and she had it on her bed for 5 minutes. I'm not happy especially with the price not being cheap. I mean how can a bed in bag set have a hole in the comforter. Smh😡
customer_reviews.author: SHARONDA  BROWN

customer_reviews.title: Average light weight comforter
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a light weight comforter and this is it. Washed up well and color is as shown. Not super soft or anything but comfortable enough. I ordered a king size for my queen bed and glad I did! This runs small and is not truly the dimensions advertised. A queen would’ve been too small for sure. I like how it’s reversible. A bit overpriced for its simplicity but I like it ok.
customer_reviews.author: J. Geyer

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great comforter set!
customer_reviews.text: When I first received this comforter, I didn't expect the quality to be that great due to the price being so affordable. But I was wrong! I've had it for a few months now and have washed it at least 4-5 times and it still looks brand new. Not too heavy, not too light. For me, just right. Very happy with this purchase and I intend to buy another for my guest room.
customer_reviews.author: Deb H.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and not boring
customer_reviews.text: I love this comforter set. It is both elegant and comfortable. It has a silky feel to it. Its also light weight and apparently durable. I had doubts about ordering something like this online but im glad i tried it.. The reversible feature makes the this comforter very convenient. I will now get to change the look of my bed everytime I wash the set. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Henny Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Definitely “Lightweight” but Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love this comforter set but only gave it 3-stars because it is extremely lightweight and not made for New England weather. We used it last night and my husband and I both woke up saying we were cold during the night. It will be perfect in the summer but for now, I will have to get a blanket and try to match the teal color! Looks great and love that it is reversible!
customer_reviews.author: SIGGY

customer_reviews.title: Super Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Its a decent blanket. Id say its a bit expensive for what you get. Its not soft enough or comfortable enough to justify a price like that to me. Its a nice throw blanket I guess but thats about it. Maybe if it was a softer fabric Id be satisfied but, as it stands id say look for something else. I bought another blanket recently for the same price, check out that review, I love it and have to recommend that one instead.
customer_reviews.author: The Jester

customer_reviews.title: Just a blanket
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be more fluffier and vibrant red.😒 It’s not the comforter is thin like something u can lay on the couch with. And the color is dull red not popping red like I thought. I’ll keep for now but not really satisfied😫
customer_reviews.author: Taylordaqueen

customer_reviews.title: Arrived brand new with loose threading all over!
customer_reviews.text: The feeling of this blanket reminds me of a cheap sleeping bag. It’s super lightweight, and thin which is good for summertime. I’m upset however because after taking it out of the package I immediately noticed lots of loose threading. I ordered this in a king size too, so I’m not looking forward to trying to find all the loose threads to cut off.. very disappointed because the last comforter I bought off Amazon ripped and had holes all over causing the filling to come out. I just hope this lasts....
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Cooper

customer_reviews.title: King size actually fits a full size bed.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't fit my king size bed. It was advertised as a king/california king size. On my king it barely came to the edge of the mattress. I ended up keeping it for a full size bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: More than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I needed a quilt with grey in the design and thought I was settling for this pattern--hoping it would look good when in place. I was so pleased when it arrived. It's vacuum packed==so opening it and watching it expand was a fun part of the purchase. The colors are vibrant and both sides (dark or white) are very atractive. I am so glad I chose it. If you like the picture--you'll love the quilt in actual life. It's soft, light, and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: M. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great Bedding!
customer_reviews.text: This turned out perfect, we were ready for a change and this was a great purchase. The bedding is soft and thin but not too thin. We are hot sleepers so I was worried about it being too hot but after a few nights this comforter has worked out great. We have a king size bedding and I think it is sized perfect. It doesn't seem to wrinkle and is very lightweight and soft, I ordered navy blue and it is a little bit darker than I expected but still able to see that is a blue shade and not black. Great purchase and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Hnel

customer_reviews.title: It’s just okay.
customer_reviews.text: Good bargain comforter. The black isn’t as black as shown in the photo. The queen size is short on either side so you have to strategically make the bed. I would not recommend this product if you’re looking for the final touch in your bedroom. But I DO recommend it as a temporary solution or if you just don’t care all that much. Feels fairly light weight, but haven’t used it yet so I’m not sure if it’s warmer than it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very light but still warm
customer_reviews.text: Likes: The product came on time than expected delivery despite snow storm in my area. I ordered king size but I was little afraid that it may be small for actually long size bed like some other brands but it is actually very good size for king bed. Love the color as it is very bright and good thing it is reversible as well. Dislikes: It is thinner compared to some other brand but I always liked the thinner comforter because thick comforter makes me suffocate. However despite being thin, it can still keep you warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonuser413

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color on both sides. I have mine black side up. Very comfy, and light weight. It also keeps me warm with the fan going or with the window open. It's still winter here and I'm very comfortable with just the blanket. (Pillow case's are on back pillows. But are very nice. Exactly as pictured)
customer_reviews.author: Nita P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but it’s thin, Not fluffy
customer_reviews.text: Don’t get me wrong, this looks nice but I need to put a warmer blanket underneath because the “comforter” is not warm at all. I thought the comforter would be more thicker than it actually is especially for the price. I give it 3 stars and it’s mainly just because it looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Bing Bang for your Buck
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this comforter set for my 5-year old son. The fabric is soft and lightweight and can be used all year round. My son loves to jump on the bed, and it doesn't seem to affect the fabric or the stitching. I absolutely love how the pillow cover has a hidden zipper so that even the pillow is reversible. This comforter was perfect for my son's room - it's practical, wrinkle-free, and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Aldama

customer_reviews.title: Good quality Not Red its a Very Red shade of Brick Red
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and is made of good material. It's not a normal red however. I'll have to go back over their description as it is more of a very red "Brick Red". Was a bit dissapointed however as it was purchased to cover the top bunk bed matching a very Red, White & Blue Brand Name comforter on the bottom bunk. It's a good buy just not the straight up red I was hopin for.
customer_reviews.author: ShireysShineysnShite

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful well made comforter.
customer_reviews.text: After searching for a lightweight comforter that is not only well priced and soft but matches our blue upholstered bed, this is a true WINNER in my book! I'm impressed with the quality and stitching as well as the super soft pillow shams that zip.
customer_reviews.author: R H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my son for Christmas. He told me it was perfect. Not too heavy, not too light, perfect for New England nights! He said the size was great and the color was just what he wanted. Washes well, he has a bulldog who makes the bed his own. Brutus loves the blanket too!
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: 1 year later
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about a year now and I can honestly say that this comforter set is worth the price. If i ever get tired of one side I can always flip it over and it gives my room a new feel. The comforter itself is very warm without being so thick that you feel like you are suffocating.
customer_reviews.author: Annia A.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This comforter exceeded my expectations. It is lightweight, but warm! Also, it is softer than i thought it would be. I love the colors (I got red/black) and the diamond pattern. I washed it before use and air dried it and it stayed together just fine. All around great comforter and well worth the price, too. The size full/queen fits my queen size bed great.
customer_reviews.author: Kdaddy

customer_reviews.title: Pulled apart
customer_reviews.text: After 2 nights, the comforter started pulling apart (6in.) at the seam. Luckily I can sew and fix it, but wish I didn't have to. It is very soft and light weight though and would have got 5 stars if it didn't pull apart so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: lefty313

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This is the king size comforter that came with the pillow shams . I love the fact that this comforter is light weight and reversible. Decor is my thing and when I decided to switch the color of my room from black and white to gray and white my first place to shop was amazon. I tell you the truth I’m not disappointed. I won’t be sticking my feet out from underneath the cover because I’m too hot . I slept will last night under the Comfortable comforter and the color is absolutely gorgeous . Luxurious look without The high pricing.
customer_reviews.author: Tyreese and Shonica Smithers

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not cute enough to justify the price. also came covered in lint :/
customer_reviews.text: Definitely think this is not worth the price. it is cute and lightweight but for 50 bucks i was expecting higher quality. it came covered in lint!! i was afraid it was bugs!! kinda wrinkly maybe the wrinkles will work themselves out but idk! it will work for all seasons for me with an electric blanket but overall would not buy again or recommend to anyone. wish i had bought a nicer comforter on sale. the peachy pink color is pretty and i like the dual sides w the grey but the color alone isn’t worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Very thin, color fades quickly, I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this comforter set thinking it would be like a down comforter, it is not. It is an extremely thin comforter. The title suggests it is like a down comforter and it is the farthest thing from that. I washed it one time when I first got it, and the pink color has already faded on it so much! I’m very disappointed in this comforter set, but I guess that’s what you get for the price!
customer_reviews.author: katelyn giudice

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: This is nothing like the picture or description. It is flat and thin. Low quality
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Light and warm
customer_reviews.text: The shipping was fast! I received the comforter the next day after placing the order. It is light summer comforter but it was warmer than I thought, the temperature just dropped to 40 some degrees around where I live, the comforter came in the right time, it kept me warm during the night and felt really good for a good night sleep. It kept fluffy after first wash and didn't fade or shrink, I would buy another one with light blue color.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this comforter set on prime day along with a new sheet set and a mattress topper and our sleep game has totally changed! I love this comforter because it’s not too heavy and not too light. It’s cool enough for summer with the ac running, and you can add a few blankets to the bed in the winter. It’s truly good year round. It’s also nice and soft and comfortable. You really get great value for your money with this set! Only thing is the grey is a bit darker in real life than in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: RECEIVED WRONG COLOR; Resolved by Amz.
customer_reviews.text: RECEIVED WRONG COLOR!! ORDERED RED/BLACK! RECEIVED SOME OTHER GREY COLOR! Amz issued return label for not correct and shipped correct red/black as originally ordered. Great Amz service; really like the red/black set; so revised rating to four stars.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not a comforter
customer_reviews.text: Definitely wouldn't call it a comforter, it's more like a thicker bedspread. The colors were accurate and exactly what I was looking for. Just wish it was more of a comforter. Being in an extremely cold state in winter, warmth may be a problem. For the price point, it's a pretty good product.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty. It does not come with a dust ruffle ...
customer_reviews.text: Very Pretty. It does not come with a dust ruffle which i only assumed it would but looking at the description it is not included. So that being said I need one to match but the comforter is perfect, very attractive, love the two tones. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Expected the worst, received the BEST!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my comforter, and I am beyond happy. The price was phenomenal. The comforter is soft and thin enough I can still use my down blanket when needed. I love that it is reversible so it can give two feelings to the room. The color is 100% true to the picture. There was absolutely no smell to it, which is important to me. It's perfect! What a great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Swade

customer_reviews.title: Good value, lightweight, and classy looking.
customer_reviews.text: This is more like a quilt than a comforter. It's lightweight, which is great for those who sleep hot. I wouldn't pick it for a Minnesota winter, but it would be great for a winter, say, in the mid-Atlantic states. The shell is smooth polyester. It's not as soft as cotton, but it's still pretty soft and comfortable. I like that it's reversible. The white background side makes smaller rooms feel bigger since it's a lighter color.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo S Crowbar

customer_reviews.title: Color is way different in person. It looks more ...
customer_reviews.text: Color is way different in person. It looks more of a bright, vivid turquoise in the photo, but it's more of a darker blue teal in person
customer_reviews.author: K McCh

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but not the material I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: This design and the colors are beautiful. Blanket itself is soft. However, it is like a silk feeling. Causes a lot of static which is bad for a hairy husband. In the description it didn’t say anything about that. I wanted this for my master bedroom, now it’s getting stuck in a hutch.
customer_reviews.author: m.walker

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Ok so for the price this set is pretty good. Based on other reviews I got a king size (my bed is a queen) and I’m glad I did cuz it fits just right. Def get a size bigger than you need. I ordered the magenta and purple set the purple is true to the pic but the magenta is not as vibrant in person it’s more of a dark pink it looks more magenta in sunlight or with a flash then soft lighting. It’s very soft and comfy def lightweight not as puffy as the pic depicts. Overall I’m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this bed set for a few months now, so here’s my genuine review, it’s perfect for AZ weather. Light weight, soft, and I love how the pillow cases have zippers, I’ve washed it many many times, and no tears or anything as of yet, it’s holding up pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very good product I love it it’s light enough to where you don’t sweat it Knight but have enough to keep you nice and warm as you sleep love the colors in the collection
customer_reviews.author: Michael Payne

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Great comforter set for my 4 year old. It keeps her warm but not to a point where she’s sweaty. She loves the color and it’s just the right pink. I would definitely buy this again for a child’s room. For an adult, we should invest in something a bit nicer and classier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great comforter for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good comforter for a good price. Does its job and looks good. I like that it is reversable so i can change the look here and there a bit. It will keep you warm but if you are in the middle of a qinter wonderland you mught need an extra comforter to go with this one. But since its so cheap it can only so good so it gets 5 stars for what its worth. If it was 200 bucks id be pissed
customer_reviews.author: nathan

customer_reviews.title: So lovely!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! It's a beautiful and simple design. Lovely colors. Light weight and comfortable to sleep under, if you're not one of those that removes before sleeping. I have not yet washed, but I will update my review if it doesn't last well after a cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Buckwheat91

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. You feel so cozy snuggled up in this blanket. Its not a blanket to keep you warm in the winter without an extra layer but its exactly as described in the discription. It fits and looks perfect on my twin bed.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Buy King to fit Queen bed
customer_reviews.text: Well made, soft, warm, light weight.....got a King size to fit on a Queen bed....by rotating it 90 degrees, there is more than enough to cover the foot of the bed, and enough overhang on the sides (nearly to the floor) to prevent a nights tossing and turning from exposing the sides to a draft!
customer_reviews.author: SanLeandroGuy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set!! I did read the reviews and viewed pics in the reviews before buying and saw that it is NOT thick like in the original picture. I’m personally glad because my husband stays hot and we can’t have thick blankets. So I bought it because it was actually thin after finding the style I liked.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: very nice quilt - just a little too warm for us
customer_reviews.text: very nice quilt - well made - very comfy. It's just a little too warm for us (live in NC). We prefer a lighter weight quilt. So many people said it wasn't warm enough for cold weather climate so we gave it a try but it's just too warm and cozy.
customer_reviews.author: Susan H in Cary NC

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: This is really cute and super soft, but when it says it's green I expect the color to actually be green. The green is more of a teal/turquoise color. It's just not what I was looking for. Thankfully I have a friend who really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Rory Vyxen

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was a great investment for the money. Feels good and I would recommend if you have a queen, get the king size like I did. The pillow cases will be too big for standard size pillows but our queen size pillows doesn't make it look too big. If you have king size pillows, it will fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: TERRENCE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price, soft
customer_reviews.text: I needed something for my bed fast, we are having photos taken to sell the house. I wanted something neutral and comfy without spending a lot of money. Arrived on time and in good shape. Survived the first washing and we slept well on our great looking bed.
customer_reviews.author: Heddy

customer_reviews.title: Decent product.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this comforter for about six months. I have a California King and was worried about the fit. It was true to size but I would recommend a dry cleaner. I washed it in cold and it shrunk quite a bit the first time. It's maintained it's softness and shape after 12 washings. My only complaints are the shrinking and I have lot of loose threads throughout but again I am machine washing. I still think it's a great value.
customer_reviews.author: William Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not quite
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a King size and it fit like a Queen. Nice color and material though
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice on the picture but the real thing isn't the quality I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping for more for this. I found this to be low quality and under sized. It didn't stay well on my sheets or my queen size bed it was not very puffy and I couldn't get a good temperature when I slept with it. I sense got a new comforter from Walmart for about 60 bucks which I really like and does a much better job.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Heavy enough but not bulky
customer_reviews.text: Smooth, soft, has washed well 2 times since purchasing and we love how easy it is to roller hair off with yet another gadget that was purchased from amazon... great price, we used lightweight blanket and this so we can easily use one or both based on weather. Great value for price.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMom

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the money !!
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is not thick but very nice ! I wanted something that would fit in the washer and this fits the bill ! The red and black has very nice colors ! The comforter is bigger than most I looked at ! Good buy !! Shipped fast !! It is not fancy but very nice !!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie L. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome comforter
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my really old threadbare comforter with this product and what an upgrade. This product fits the King bed perfectly, is machine washable, dries quickly in our Arizona sun and keeps us nice and warm. Great value for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Redbird

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok guest room not master
customer_reviews.text: It’s snug should have got a king for my Queen I don’t like it tooo short
customer_reviews.author: Yellie

customer_reviews.title: Nice comforter!
customer_reviews.text: This bed comforter is pretty lightweight and is really comfortable. It’s soft and I love how it’s revisable. The two pillow shams can match the comforter color that you’re using. his bed comforter is pretty lightweight and is really comfortable. It’s soft and I love how it’s revisable. The two pillow shams can match the comforter color that you’re using. his bed comforter is pretty lightweight and is really comfortable. It’s soft and I love how it’s revisable. The two pillow shams can match the comforter color that you’re using.
customer_reviews.author: Jones Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Overwhelmingly dissatisfied with this product. When I went to return it I was going to be charged $10 for shipping, so I kept for emergencies, but I do not like this blanket and do not think it is worth what I paid for it. Very cheap look and feel and very wrinkly looking no matter what I do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised at the quality of this comforter especially since it was so cheap. I'm very pleased with it. I wanted to get something cheaper because we have two big dogs and it didn't make sense to spend so much money on a comforter. The quality is just as good as something that is more expensive. I definitely recommend buying
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: just plain great!
customer_reviews.text: The price was great. But I was pleasantly surprised by the quality. I have washed and dried my set several times now. Still is like when I bought it. Will get other colors. Fast shipping too. Just an all around great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah J Scott

customer_reviews.title: I bought Brown/Tan and Pink/Lavender, here's what I think..
customer_reviews.text: The pink isn't as bright as the photo but I love the lavender side. It's not very soft but not rough, doesn't suffocate and also gives you the comfort you need without needing to pile more blankets on. Feels like it'll last a good amount of time. When the bed is all made it looks very nice. I bought my boyfriend the brown/tan and it dressed his room up nicely! That one looks just like it's photo. I do feel like my money was well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Brown

customer_reviews.title: Bought IT TWICE We loved it so Much
customer_reviews.text: Put a Queen size comforter on my Christmas list for our guest room. My husband and i ended up having to use it for a night because our bed got sick on our quilt. We loved it so much we went back and bought a comforter for our bed. Its light and breathable for people like my husband who sleep HOT, but thick and warm enough for people like me who like their blankets to be heavier than a sheet and who get cold easily. Pet hair doesnt stick tot he comforter either which was a HUGE plus. and its machine washable. 10/10 recommend. Its perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it!!!
customer_reviews.text: After receiving this item I noticed that the dye in the fabric was fading and white spots were randomly appearing. I returned the product and received a replacement. The second item is doing the same thing. It looks awful. Don’t buy this product. Amazon should stop selling to unsuspecting customers
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t receive the pillow cases with my order; order immediately fixed.
customer_reviews.text: The piece itself seems nice; stylish, simple. It feels of high quality material. Just put it on my bed- but I didn’t receive my pillow cases with my order, only the comforter itself. ** UPDATED REVIEW:** Immediately after finding out about this occurrence, the company’s customer service reached out to me to apologize for the issue and wanted to make it right. They were so considerate and we decided that the best approach was re-ordering the product and receiving a full refund for that second order. Again, wonderful, comfortable bedding set. Very happy with order.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It’s very warm and I live where we don’t get too cold that offends but it kept me nice and warm. Padded nicely. I hope they keep around for long time cause I’ll come back when I get bigger bad to buy another one. Red is a true red. Thanks for the black and red it so hard to find that combo.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey W.

customer_reviews.title: It’s HOT in Vegas and this is so light
customer_reviews.text: I’m one of those people that CANNOT sleep without a comforter, but I live in Las Vegas, NV, which is extremely hot; so this comforter is such a welcome solution to still getting sleep without sweating, and the wrinkle free fabric is much appreciated!
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: soft
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my little one's bed and she loves it. It's super soft and lightweight. Feels a lot like ours so she loves it. The color is so pretty as well, looks like the picture. (Got the pink/grey)
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be more pleased with this purchase. The colour is a vibrant yellow (even with the reverse being black) it's soft and lightweight but still keeps you warm. I have washed and dried it twice now and it hasn't lost any of it's integrity. I did go up in size for more coverage for my queen sized bed. I would suggest to go up in size if you like your comforter to hide your mattress entirely.
customer_reviews.author: cooldude

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, Soft, and Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Before purchasing, I was nervous as this was my first time buying a comforter online. While this has a lot of good reviews, the bad ones of course had me afraid it would be a bad purchase. I washed it as soon as i got it on a normal cycle, it remained soft and fully in tact afterwards. I think the colors are nice and it is great for a lightweight blanket. I am happy with my purchase. If you live with someone who gets very hot at night i think this is a great choice, in the winter I will probably continue to use this just with an extra blanket on those colder nights. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.text: The color is gorgeous! The look, feel and weight of this comforter is perfect for us. Fits the king size bed perfectly, and is super easy to clean. Love the reversible colors and the pillow shams. So happy with this purchase, it really makes our bedroom pop.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Comforter Set
customer_reviews.text: Best comforter set I've ever had ... It's beautiful. The quality is great. My daughter liked mine so much that I had to purchase another one. Now my other daughter wants a set. I also have other designs in my cart from the same company and will be purchasing more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Janet'

customer_reviews.title: GET ONE!
customer_reviews.text: It’s very nice and I love the two tones goes well together a con for me would be that it got crumbled up a bit in the dryer and it’s like it dried up I suggest you dry it on low and watch it every now and then as it drys so you don’t end up getting that crunchy look but overall like I said it’s nice and worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi-Ann Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Soft and wrinkle free
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with this purchase. I needed a light weight comforter for summer and took a gamble and ordered one from amazon. The material is soft and durable. It has so far been so easy to wipe stains off as well. I love that it is wrinkle free...I will now look for a soft bedsheet that is the same material as well.
customer_reviews.author: Zibby

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: This color combination is surprisingly hard to find. The orange was brighter than the photo, but it wasn't a problem. I was afraid it was going to be too thin or rough but it was soft and as thick as the photo. The black is slightly on the grey side, which may only bother you if you have it with other slightly different shades of black. Happy over all!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Nice color and design
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this gorgeous comforter set. I like the comforter which are warm just right not too much warm or plain cold. This was exactly as expected and due to its versatile color and design it fits all decors. I had friends over for long weekend and they complimented the design too. The size full/queen fits my full size bed perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: VD

product_meta.title: downluxe Lightweight Down Alternative Reversible 3-Piece Comforter Set with 2 Reversible Pillow Shams,Grey, Full/Queen
feature_bullets: SIZE & PACKAGE: Queen Down Alternative Comforter Set includes 1 Reversible Bed Comforter measures 88 inches x 92 inches and 1 Reversible Pillow Sham measures 20 inches x 26 inches. The pillow sham with 2 inches flange is exquisite and fashionable.
PREMIUM FABRIC: 100 Percent Brushed Microfiber fabric is breathable and durable with a high tensile strength which also provides extra soft, comfortable, fade resistant and wrinkle resistant.

POPULAR DESIGN: The filling of this Solid Comforter Set is less likely to rip or tear because of better stitching; Rich colors can be choosing to matching different decoration styles. Perfect lightweight comforter set suits all seasons.
CRAING TIPS: The Reversible Comforter set is machine washable. Machine wash in gentle cycle with cold water. Air under sunshine to dry, or tumble dry in low heat.

NO WORRY RETURN: Downluxe Reversible Comforter Set is an ideal gift for your loved ones on special occasions. If any possibility you have suggestions for this bed comforter set please contact us for best solution.
